mapper.select: select top (#{page.currentNum}) o.id, o.title, o.attachmentImg, o.content, o.createTime, o.createUserId, o.modifyTime, o.modifyUserId from (select row_number() over(order by modifyTime desc) as rownumber, * from (select * from tb_promotion) as oo ) as o where rownumber > #{page.rowNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_promotion(id, title, attachmentImg, content, createTime, createUserId, modifyTime, modifyUserId) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{attachmentImg}, #{content}, GETDATE(), #{createUserId}, GETDATE(), #{updateUserId})
